name: pnp-list-formatting-twitter-timeline
title: Twitter Timeline
shortDescription: This sample formats your SharePoint list view to look like Twitter. If you are using the Microsoft Flow Templates to track tweets in a SharePoint list, this is a great way to format your list so that it looks more like Twitter.
longDescription: This sample formats your SharePoint list view to look like Twitter. If you are using the Microsoft Flow Templates to track tweets in a SharePoint list, this is a great way to format your list so that it looks more like Twitter.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
